Allow: /
Allow: /skills
Allow: /blog

Sitemap: https://parthbhodia.com/sitemap.xml

# Specific crawlers
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot  
Allow: /

User-agent: LinkedInBot
Allow: /

User-agent: facebookexternalhit
Allow: /

User-agent: Twitterbot
Allow: /

# Block common spam bots
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: MJ12bot
Disallow: /

User-agent: SemrushBot
Disallow: /

Crawl-delay: 1
